purpose: Facilitates seamless interaction and management of human-in-the-loop AI agents through an intuitive inbox interface.
principle: Built using TypeScript and React, it leverages web technologies to create a dynamic user interface for agent management.
reusability: Designed as a pluggable UI component that can be integrated into existing applications to enhance agent interaction capabilities.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may lack comprehensive features and stability expected in production environments.

highlight: Provides a user-friendly inbox interface for managing interactions between humans and AI agents.
